abstract: Royal Dutch Shell and BP’s record first-quarter profits, beat analysts’ expectations and prompted share gains across the industry.
snippet: Royal Dutch Shell and BP’s record first-quarter profits, beat analysts’ expectations and prompted share gains across the industry.
lead_paragraph: LONDON  Higher oil and natural gas prices helped Royal Dutch Shell and BP report record first-quarter profits on Tuesday, beating analysts’ expectations and prompting share gains across the industry.

headline.main: Record Profits Reported for BP and Shell
headline.print_headline: Record Profits Reported for BP and Shell
